pair.no_device_selected: It appears you did not select a device in the previous window, please try again.
pair.error: Make sure your device is connected to the same network as Homey, and try again.

smile.title: Please enter the Smile ID
smile.find_id: There is a label on your Smile-device, the Smile ID can be found on this label as shown in the illustration.
smile.wrong_id: You entered a wrong Smile ID, please try again. The Smile ID is a string containing 8 lowercase letters. Error: __error__

stretch.find_id: There is a label on your Stretch-device, the Stretch ID can be found on this label as shown in the illustration.
stretch.wrong_id: You entered a wrong Stretch ID, please try again. The Stretch ID is a string containing 8 lowercase letters. Error: __error__
